quote:
Hamesha yaad rakho tumhari kamiyabi tumhari khud etimaad mein posheeda hai.
        Ye shayari 'Allama Iqbal' ki hai.

Pareshaniyan aap ki zindagi mein itni hi ahmiyat rakhti hain jitni namak ka khanay mein.
        Ye shayari 'Gulzar' ki hai.

Kamiyabi hamesha un logon ka muqaddar hoti hai jo koshish karna nahi chhortay.
        Ye shayari 'Amjad Islam Amjad' ki hai.

Na thakne wala hosla hi insaan ko kamiyab banata hai.
        Ye shayari 'Wasim Bano' ki hai.

Zindagi ek safar hai ise behtareen tareeqay se guzaro.
        Ye shayari 'Mirza Ghalib' ki hai.

Hoslay ki bulandiyan kabhi na chhoro yahi tumhein asman ki bulandiyon tak pohnchati hain.
        Ye shayari 'Parveen Shakir' ki hai.

Khawab dekho khwabon ko haqeeqat banao aur duniya ko hairan karo.
        Ye shayari 'Ahmad Faraz' ki hai.

Nakaami ke baad hi kamiyabi ka rasta nazar ata hai.
        Ye shayari 'Jigar Moradabadi' ki hai.

Mushkilat se na ghabrao yeh tumhein mazboot banati hain.
        Ye shayari 'Firaq Gorakhpuri' ki hai.

Kamiyabi ka asal raaz mehnat aur lagan mein hai.
        Ye shayari 'Bashir Badr' ki hai.

Zindagi mein aage barhne ke liye khud par etimaad rakho.
        Ye shayari 'Jon Elia' ki hai.

Mushkilat se ghabrane wale kabhi kamiyab nahi hote.
        Ye shayari 'Jon Elia' ki hai.
